title: Ticket #7718: Better random number support for jobs
description:
HTCondor should provide a reliable way for user's jobs to get random numbers that are reproducible should their jobs preempt or if they need to resubmit their jobs.

Design doc in https://docs.google.com/document/d/10_7vuMkp1N_63DfUgly6FhZDw8xbPOiJ1qmArx-NQHY/edit?usp=sharing
